fields.Title of Presentation: Active Learning in the Mathematics Classroom: IF-AT Forms and Other Tricks
fields.Sponsoring Organization: Idaho State Board of Education, State Department of Education, and Boise School District.
fields.Description/Abstract: This session will demonstrate how to 1) structure teams and activities to encourage learning collaboratively INSTEAD of creating student anxiety about how their grade depends on the team; 2) use IF-AT forms to promote individual accountability and to assess learning formatively in order to make best use of class time; and 3) design team work to naturally challenge advanced students while helping weak students learn more than they might on their own. Also, we’ll discuss how to pick and choose which techniques might be the least work for you to incorporate AND most beneficial to your students.
